title: Excellent platform which will continue to grow
text:
The concept is fantastic and is so much safer than standard betting. The different ways you can generate income is brilliant and bets last three years before having to worry about cashing in. 
The new update of the IOS app is nice, but there are still some differences between the website and app. The ability to ‚Äòstar‚Äô players you are interested in but haven‚Äôt bought yet hasn‚Äôt come across from the website to the app, whilst you also cannot sort based on % gain or dividends return which would be useful. 
I would also like it to be possible to search via a players club to make it easier to search for players. 
The ability to spin the app when turning the phone screen could allow for more visibility when looking at your portfolio too. 
Overall a super product and very glad to have found it, just wish I had done so six months earlier!

title: Football Player Trading
text:
A unique innovative platform where you can buy, hold & sell players. Traders can make money from a variety of ways - price rise, performance dividends, media dividends & inplay dividends (goals & assists). 
Unlike a normal bet you won‚Äôt lose all your money & the player could rise again into profit.
Football Index listen to their customers & are constantly looking at ways to expand & improve the product.
The platform has a few bugs & does need improving. I believe the trend list should be money increase, not percentage. This is because lower priced players get on the trend list easier. Also it would be very handy to know your profit/loss from selling & how that would affect your balance before you did so.
I really enjoy the product & I will not be placing a normal bet again.

title: Great product
text: This is the perfect product for me. I love football and I love investing. There are of course risks so you should read all the rules, which are clearly laid out. There are also plenty of tutorial videos out there to assist, and a great twitter community. The product itself is innovative, you buy and sell players and you get dividends if they appear in the media and if they perform well (insert caveat here). The only reason it isn‚Äôt 5 stars is because it‚Äôs still early days and they need more player analysis, the app still has an annoying bug when you top up on existing players it first looks like you‚Äôre buying more at the same price and takes too long to update to show you the current price you are buying at, which can be misleading so they need to tighten up on performance.

title: Make money having fun on a simple, effective platform.
text: If you are thinking of joining, don't hesitate join this unique platform. On a personal note I have been trading on the index for around a year and my portfolio has doubled since my original investment. For me football index is the final string to the bow in the world of sports betting. Buying futures in football players something we sometimes love and sometimes hate, makes an incredibly moving market. In which you can make some serious money. I am constantly having a joke and a laugh with my friends about the app, who in turn are on the verge of joining. My advice to anybody starting up is to put your knowledge in making decisions, when it comes to a football player everybody has an opinion!

title: Finally making money from my football knowledge
text: After dumping thousands of pounds over the years with traditional bookmakers, I have finally discovered a platform that allows me to make money from my knowledge by allowing me to trade shares in footballers who can earn me dividends over time. Instead of spewing money every weekend on a coupons I now deposit a little each week into my football index account and buy underpriced players and watch them grow each week. It gives me the buzz feeling of a sports bet without it burning a hole in my wallet. Best part is FootballIndex allow you to trade risk free for the first 7 days (up to ¬£500). I 10/10 recommend this platform to anybody who thinks they know their football.

title: The Game. Changed üöÄ
text:
This platform, only being 4 year olds, is still in its early stages but has seen a huge increase in the market by both the numbers of traders and the size of individual investments. This shows the increasing confidence in the platform and I feel that ‚Äòhuge‚Äô will be nothing compared to what will be seen over the next few years. I consider this to be a small drop in the ocean.

FI is very different to usual sports betting as you don‚Äôt lose everything after one losing decision. You may lose a certain amount, but it‚Äôs up to you as to how much risk you take and when you choose to buy/sell a player. Hence, The Game. Changed üöÄ

I‚Äôll admit there have been system issues over the years, but the FI team have continued to grow in the way they resolve the issues and also how to prevent them. Any issues can be frustrating, but the positive growth in the product massively outweighs them.

I highly recommend this platform to anyone looking to use their football knowledge to make some money, but have a bit of thrill and excitement at the same time.

title: Best app I ever downloaded
text:
I personally can‚Äôt believe this app has so many one stars reviews, all the 1 star reviews I‚Äôve just seen are people that haven‚Äôt spent time researching the app and are mad they lost money. The app itself runs perfectly and is easy to use. The reason you have to withdraw to the same card is so someone can‚Äôt log on and take all your money out to their card, nothing wrong with that. 
I have been on football index for 2 months now and in the last month I‚Äôm made 10% on my investment! More than I‚Äôd earn on my savings account in 5 years, get on this app ASAP, so much fun researching players and getting paid when they smash it on the pitch, love it!

title: Football index missing funds
text:
I have been using football index for over a week, 6 days ago some of my funds went missing from my account. I contacted Football Index the only way possible, which is by email. I received an automated reply and nothing more.

Approximately ¬£200 of my money disappeared from my account, following numerous emails without a response I finally received ¬£100 back into my account together with an email explaining that they have had problem with their system (what they called ‚ÄúAn Outage‚Äù ) and apologising.

However ¬£100 still remains outstanding from my account and I have since written to them every day, once again without a response.

I feel that this problem could easily be fixed if they had a contact number to call or if they actually read the emails sent to customer support and call me to discuss the issue.

I feel like they have stolen ¬£100 of my money. The nature of football index means that you are required to deposit considerable funds into their hands. I have now lost all trust that they are responsible enough to be able to look after my funds. Terrible experience, which is a shame because it is fun to use.

Hopefully somebody at football index will read this review and look into my account and generally improving the customer services procedure.

title: Great innovative platform
text: Having been on the index a couple of years I can only say good things about it. It combines fantasy football with gambling in a way never seen before. Wanting to invest some money into stocks and share but not knowing where to start this platform has seen me return 100% on my investment so far and has been easier, more profitable  and more fun than conventional stocks and shares. Also gotta love getting paid daily dividends which I reinvest for comping interest. Tip for new users- start small and learn the platform before investing big. Also try to think long term, any dips in the market won‚Äôt last long and are the best time to invest!

title: Andy H
text: If you‚Äôre a football fan that‚Äôs into sports betting or always wanted to trade on a stock market, but never properly understood it, like myself. Then Football Index is for you. It‚Äôs an exciting way to make money whilst watching football and expanding your knowledge of European footballers. I‚Äôve been trading since December 2015, and the platform is still relatively new and unheard of. There is so much expansion for the platform still to make as it‚Äôs recently branched out to other countries and continues to grow it‚Äôs advertising. Jump on board, have fun making money, picking up dividends daily, and see your portfolio grow as Football Index itself grows.

title: Changing gambling forever
text: I used to bet regularly ¬£10 here, ¬£20 there - and ended up constantly down. Then I stumbled across FI the beauty of the product is you can chase those short term high risk wins (all be it you‚Äôll never lose your stake instantly like a traditional bookmaker) or you can trade as you would shares on the stock or currency markets, but rather than in a product you know nothing about in a market you know nothing about it‚Äôs in the thing you love, football. I‚Äôve made significant profit playing FI, but above that I‚Äôve engaged with a great online community and had a lot of fun too.

title: A scam
text:
I tried withdrawing money after a few days of using the app and it wouldn‚Äôt let me, said I needed to verify my age which I tried to do. Only way you can verify age is by having a passport/ driving license (no problem) AND a proof of address that is less than 3 months old, your proof of address can‚Äôt be a mobile bank statement it can only be a tax bill or a copy of a bank statement which in today‚Äôs world isn‚Äôt so easy to get with everything being paperless. Don‚Äôt fall for the scam.

Updated: trying to log back on again despite the fact I can‚Äôt withdraw my money I thought I would just have fun with the money on their and see what happened. My account has been ‚Äúsuspended‚Äù for no reason. An absolute scam, brilliant idea that seems interesting but the people behind this app are out to exploit

userName: I Dani do anything by Alves
title: Make money buying footballers!
text:
It‚Äôs a good app that combines the fun of fantasy football with the thrill of trading in a commodity all football fans will understand: footballers. 

I would like to see some additional features like being able to search your portfolio by value risen or fallen in the previous 24 hours. It would also be useful to have upcoming fixtures included in a player‚Äôs bio.

Overall, The Football Index is a fantastic concept and I would highly recommend to those that know their football. Much better than losing money on unlikely accumulators!

title: Does exactly what it says on the tin
text:
I have been on for 1 year and seen healthy profit on my investments. Recent dips in the market of course scare new users but the product is definitely still growing and although you might not see such massive growths as with a year or two ago, a steady increase will happen with the right players.

Moreover, many ways to make profit. Not just from increased share price but( to name only two) in play dividends( payout if you player scores or assists) and media dividends( your player features in the daily news)

title: Great profits, dull product
text:
I‚Äôve made a shedload of money on Football Index but now feel very disenfranchised with it. The product has very little fun or excitement to it. If you want something purely to make money then it‚Äôs for you, especially if you like football. 
If you want something more fun based with some profit available on the side then I‚Äôd highly recommend Footstock - daily fantasy football combined with trading that actually gets the pulse racing.
Other current new option is sportstack, more for the pure gamblers.
Long live Football Index, my stolid Football-ISA that finds my more exciting start-up adventures!

title: Great fun and great rewards
text: Really professional set-up, easy to use, and very lucrative. I enjoy football index as it gives me a great platform to invest, and I find football far more interesting than the stock market. Fantastic dividend structure, and the thrill of seeing the capital of players in your portfolio grow makes it a fun and enjoyable platform to put a bit of money each month. App runs really smoothly for cash deposits, withdrawals and trades - I‚Äôve never had a single issue with it

title: Life Changing!
text:
Never has an app or concept had such a life changing effect then this one for me. From an avid gambler who was constantly looking for that big win, I now hardly place a bet and focus fully on this app!
Whilst this is still a gambling website, it bridges the gap between betting, fantasy football and stocks & shares. Suitable for all price brackets from the casual gambler to the serious investor this is the app / platform for you.... If you do nothing else this year try this out!

title: So much better than gambling on the football!
text: This is a brilliant concept... it‚Äôs got me more interested in football than I‚Äôve ever been, and making money while I‚Äôm at it! title: Traditional bookies RIP
text: Brilliant way of using your football knowledge to see returns on your investments unlike traditional bookmakers. Many ways to earn dividends without losing your initial investment. title: Make money whilst having fun
text: I‚Äôve been on the index for just over 2 years I have a return of 215% on my investment and enjoy watching football even more than I use to when your able to watch a player in your portfolio. text: If you‚Äôve spent far too much time on the likes of Football Manager or Fantasy Premier League then Football Index is for you. title: It‚Äôs a decent app. Room for improvement
text: I use the app more than I do the site, mainly for the convenience. There are some features, such as watchlist, which don‚Äôt appear within the app but are on the site. title: A new way to experience football!
text:

title: Finally a stock market that adds fun
text:

title: It‚Äôs adequate
text:

title: The future!

title: Great app

title: USE THE WEBSITE - App pushes you out and denies access

title: The new era of sports betting
text:

title: Age verification
text:
So was asked to verify my age a few days ago after I have put money in to the account. Why does my age not get verified before I put my hard earned money in? When trying to verify my account all I get is a automated email which gives a query number and states that they will aim to get back to you within 72 hours. It‚Äôs gone past 72 hours and nothing so send a email to see if I can get an update, what do I get? A new query number! Why is there not a number to contact so customers can get an answer rather then just automated email service which is not helpful at all.

Sill waiting 90hours and waiting...

title: Can‚Äôt setup the password
text:
I am having trouble with log in setup, cant setup the password as its keep saying it has to be combination of at least 8 characters. Lower & upper case, numbers & special characters. I tried everything, cant seem to be working.

Solution: I have worked it out, go on your computer first, make an account on their website & then log in the app.

title: Really frustrating
text:
Same as most people, saw the ads and wanted to see how it works, seemed like a cool idea.

I didn‚Äôt get anywhere near the actual app because the sign up process is SO frustrating.

It‚Äôs asks you a wealth of information, some of which I get as it‚Äôs a betting platform but most which seems so unnecessary. The straw that broke the camel‚Äôs back was the password selection, which has ridiculous criteria (at least 8 letters, lower and upper case, numbers and special characters?!). I tried various passwords that fit that criteria, which were for some reason refused. After that I lost interest and deleted the app.

title: Life Changing
text:
Its almost shameful its took me this long to leave a review for this platform , but joining Football Index will easily be the best decision you will make financially in your life. 

Joined in May 17 with ¬£500 and as of today currently at over ¬£60k profit from a further ¬£15k investment. 

This next year is going to best the biggest yet. It‚Äôs not too late to join , in fact it‚Äôs only just getting started.

title: The Best
text: Brought a whole new aspect to the way I watch and follow football, I now find myself tuning into la liga, Ligue 1, bundesliga like never before. title: Revolutionary platform
text: As a trader on FI for over a year, I‚Äôve been really good impressed with the development of the platform. The potential for growth is huge. title: Revolutionalised betting
text: Signed up about 6 months ago as I was tired of continually losing money on normal betting sites - best decision I‚Äôve ever made!! title: Make money with your football knowledge
text: Great app, lacks one or two of the features of using the website but for checking your portfolio or quickly getting on or off someone it works great. Takes a while to fully understand what drives the market but money to be made for sure regardless of starting amount.

title: FI is a game changer
text:
Been on the platform for 18 months and it‚Äôs honestly a game changer.

Amazing introduction to a trading platform with the comfort of knowing your football stuff. 

It can take a while to understand the rules fully however it‚Äôs defiantly worth spending this time to monitor the market and ask questions across the forum. 

Product still in its infancy so it‚Äôs a great time to come and board, spread your risk across a number of players. Every day there are dividends on offer for media ratings and/ or performance ratings (provided by opta) so every day gives you an interest and reason to trade/ reinvest/ sit back and watch your holds capital growth. 

Beware of addiction üòè and enjoy!

title: Fun and profitable
text: I‚Äôm 10 months in and won ¬£900 in dividends and my portfolio value is ¬£2100. I‚Äôm no expert so anyone can do it. It‚Äôs jut announced its going worldwide so expect huge growth soon so great time to get into it. My one tip - follow some football index ‚Äòexperts‚Äô on Twitter. Lots of my most profitable purchases have been tips (free) from these guys. On many of these occasions I‚Äôve never heard of the player!

title: Good idea still needs work
text: The app is a great idea and adds excitement to games. The app itself isn‚Äôt easy to use. If I here some new signing rumours or an injury and I want to buy that player quick I find myself spending 10-20 mins trying to find that one player, having to spell there name exactly right, googling there official names. It would make it a lot easier if you could search by team, league, nationally all in one search bar. Great concept I just find it very temperamental using it.

title: Amazing Returns
text: Signed up to football index over 2 years ago and the returns have been quite exceptional. title: Amazing alternative to footy Betting
text:
I‚Äôve been on the app for 3 years+ now and roughly make about 7%+ returns a month with very little checking and over 550% returns so far :D
 If you‚Äôre tired of stressful football betting, try football index, it‚Äôs more of a long term approach so be patient, but well worth it compared to traditional betting and even savings accounts!

title: Genius idea - Great app
text:
FI is a brilliant idea for football fans that like to think they know a lot about football. It‚Äôs great speculating which players will perform and which players other fans love. The dividends payouts keeps your portfolio interesting and targets the star players for your portfolio.

The app is quick, smart and very user friendly. Very simplistic for an index.

title: Amazing idea
text:
Really good stocks/shares version with football. 
Although would like more performance related data & price rises as it tends to be only popular players from popular teams who consistently reap rewards. (Whether playing well or not. I.e. pogba) 
Whereas a high performing player from a lesser known team will often go unnoticed even if playing well.

title: Almost Perfect - Buzz news links issues
text:
As stated on the title, the only underlying issue I have is the Buzz news section. It‚Äôs great to see the list sources but opening them is the problem. On opening, the link is loaded but the spinning wheel blocks us from scrolling. 

Apart from that, I think if this app has filters: Biggest Increase and Biggest Decrease, on the portfolio, it would be the ultimate app!
